string.text: Give hunter the family rifle back
Bring that PDA to Barman as a proof
Neutralize insane veterans
Check in at Duty's commander
Find Duty's commander and check-in.
Procure RG6 for General Voronin
Entering the Duty grouping
Adjure
Receive a reference letter of Captain Ivantsov
Prove your allegiance to the Duty
Deliver the documents to Captain Ivantsov
Worm into the confidence of the Freedom's cook to find out where the RG6 is stored.
Pick up archive documents in the abandoned hangar.
Penetrate the territory of the Freedom grouping, locate and steal RG6
Locate the intercepted information about laboratory X18
Killing the head of Tyran squad. Tear insignia off Tyran's body as a proof to his death
Return the information about laboratory X18 to General Voronin
Deliver RG6 to General Voronin
Task for entering the Duty
Cleansing of Freedom combatants on wild territory
Return to general Voronin with Tyran's insignia
Elimination of the Freedom grouping leader
Return to General Voronin with the Freedom Leader's insignia
Test for entering the Duty
Find the rifle lost at bloodsuckers' hut
Return rifle to the hunter
Hunter's rifle
Kill the veterans and grab their leader's PDA
Kill professor Kruglov.
Help the Freedom combatants in their hunt for professor Kruglov.
Kill Professor Kruglov
Obtain reward from the informer in the bar
Destroy the camp of mad veterans
Save the research of Professor Kruglov.
Deliver the flash memory card to bartender.
Obtain a flash memory card with the research results from the professor.
Deliver the documents to bartender
Bring to bartender
Deactivate the equipment
Disable brain scorcher.
Locate and deactivate the radar
Locate the laboratory entrance
Locate the pick up the documents
Locate the documents in laboratory X16
Find out from scientists about the location of laboratory X16
Obtain the key to the entrance
On the territory of the Military base locate and neutralise the leader of Freedom grouping. Rip the clan Leader's insignia off as a proof of his death.
Deliver the documents from Laboratory X18
Obtain the documents
Find the documents from laboratory X16
Find laboratory X16 and obtain there the documents relating to brain scorcher.
